########################################################

vs <- read.table(file='vstar.txt', header=TRUE)
vs
ylims <- range(vs[,-1])*c(1, 1)
plot(vs$Day, vs[,2], type='l', ylim=ylims, col=rainbow(6)[1])
for (i in 1:5)
   {
lines(vs$Day, vs[,i+2], type='l', col=rainbow(6)[i])
   }
